<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3274</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Froehliche Weihnachten fuer Fluechtlinge!</string>
            <string language="es">Froehliche Weihnachten fuer Fluechtlinge!</string>
            <string language="ga">Froehliche Weihnachten fuer Fluechtlinge!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Froehliche Weihnachten fuer Fluechtlinge!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fuer Fluechtlinge de Froehliche Weihnachten !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fuer Fluechtlinge de Froehliche Weihnachten!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuer Fluechtlinge di Froehliche Weihnachten!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Froehliche Weihnachten fuer Fluechtlinge!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet featuring a short e-mail (revised) written by a young foreigner describing an incident in a shop. Vocabulary, comprehension and written tasks are worked around the e-mail.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo con un breve correo electrónico (revisado) escrito por un joven extranjero que describe un incidente en una tienda. Se trabaja con el vocabulario, la comprensión y tareas escritas relacionadas con el correo electrónico.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre ina bhfuil ríomhphost gearr (athbhreithnithe) scríofa ag eachtrannach óg a chuireann síos ar eachtra i siopa. Oibrítear ar thascanna foclóra, léamhthuisceana agus scríofa sa ríomhphost.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">German</string>
            <string language="es">Alemán. Lectura/Lesen. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gearmáinis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading/Lesen</string>
            <string language="ga">Léitheoireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen, der eine kurze E-mail kennzeichnet (verbessert) 
geschrieben von einem jungen Ausländer, der ein Ereignis in einem 
System beschreibt. Wortschatz, Erfassen und schriftliche 
Aufgaben werden um die E-mail bearbeitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau comportant un E-mail court (révisé) écrit par 
un jeune Étranger décrivant un incident dans un système. Le 
vocabulaire, compréhension et écrit charge sont travaillés
autour du E-mail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha que caracteriza um E-mail curto (revisado) escrito 
por um estrangeiro novo que descreve um incident em uma loja. O 
vocabulário, a compreensão e as tarefas escritas são trabalhados em
torno do E-mail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro che caratterizza un E-mail corto 
(modificato) scritto da uno straniero giovane che descrive un 
avvenimento in un negozio. Il vocabolario, la comprensione e le 
mansioni scritte sono funzionati intorno al E-mail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας που χαρακτηρίζει ένα σύντομο 
ηλεκτρονικό ταχυδρομείο (αναθεωρημένο) που γράφεται από έναν 
νέο αλλοδαπό που περιγράφει ένα γεγονός σε ένα κατάστημα. 
Το λεξιλόγιο, η κατανόηση και οι γραπτές στοιχειώδεις 
εργασίες εργάζονται γύρω από το ηλεκτρονικό ταχυδρομείο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutsch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reading/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allemand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reading/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alemão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reading/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tedesco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reading/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάγνωση/Lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
